topics.body:
"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/52f33635636872272c8f0000#post_52f33635636872272c8f0000

To be perfectly honest, it sounds far too easy to turn into an author tract. You know, the kind that 99% of are utter shit. Like a Jack Chic book but in reverse. 

If you ask me, a good idea would be to portray neither side as just pure evil, and both having legitimate points. (granted this is personal preference, but it seems stories that do that tend to be better)

...Or go the route of Wanted and make everyone, and I mean EVERYONE, an unrepetent horrible fuck.
topics.author: 500757fd7f123b75a90003b1

topics.body:
"@Princess♠Molestia":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/52f442a063687265f1990000#post_52f442a063687265f1990000
What about both?  The main characters are not evil, but the people they're representing are unrepentant horrible fucks.
topics.author: 38b55cdf63616403d7560600

topics.body:
"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/52f44ec86368721c61290000#post_52f44ec86368721c61290000

I would treat that with careful. There's something called Darkness Induced Apathy. If you make them to horrible as characters or the story is too depressing, readers won't be able to identify with them and they will stop caring all together.
topics.author: 4fdfbf92945b7075d50036e4

topics.body:
"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/52f44ec86368721c61290000#post_52f44ec86368721c61290000

Could work. All depends on how it's handled.

Though as Quasar said,  be careful not to steer into Darkness Induced Audience Apathy. Unless ofcourse that's the goal, like the aforementioned Wanted.
topics.author: 500757fd7f123b75a90003b1

topics.body:
"@Princess♠Molestia":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/52f452ee6368723f13050100#post_52f452ee6368723f13050100
"@QuasarNova":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/52f44f406368723dbb0e0000#post_52f44f406368723dbb0e0000
I really do appreciate the feedback.  I'm going to finish up what I'm doing then get started on it.

The only problem I'm seeing with it now is that it may be too short now.  The reason being is that I axed off four main characters and their story arcs cause of the feedback made me realize they would have seriously dragged it down.  It was originally going to be 120 pages, but now it's down to about 40.  Then again better to remove the bad characters than to have them drag it down.
topics.author: 38b55cdf63616403d7560600

topics.body:
Well hmm. . . I honestly don't know what to make of this :\
http://broniesagainstbullshit.tumblr.com/post/75823668053/spread-the-word-and-get-searching-it-may-even-be
There's a new movement, but they're not going, "ermagod porn is terrible ban it all" or other such things that we've seen far too often; instead they're going, "porn shows up on the google search result cause google is dumb so mark it as nsfw".

What are your thoughts on it?  I don't know what to think.

topics.body:
"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/52f519666368724106030100#post_52f519666368724106030100

I approve wholeheartedly. They're not asking the bronies to stop making porn, and the problem of NSFW content popping up on safe search is a problem. I like it.

Plus, it won't negatively affect the fandom in any way.

And the blog is handling the idiots pretty well. Not insulting them, not calling attention to it, just simply pointing out the facts.

topics.body:
"@gasmaskangel":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/52f584cd6368726321650000#post_52f584cd6368726321650000
I don't think it's that there's no reasonable people on the internet; rather too many people are newbies to the internet and too many people that think the internet is real life.

What I mean by that is the widespread adoption by people to the internet is fairly recent when you think about it and most internet users are still in the whole, "ermagod no one knows who I am" phase.

SJW like the DWM garbage are mainly either teenagers who just got their first computer or are just now getting access to the internet all together; five years down the line SJW are all going to look at how they are behaving now and feel deeply embarrassed.



The good news is that means sjw and stuff in a couple years time will be gone, cause they'll have grown out of it. . . . . . . The bad news is that because the internet is reaching more and more people, in 2020 it's estimated there will be five billion internet users(twice the current amount) the countries where it's projected the internet users are going to come from are going to be fucking terrible.  *cough All those bat shit countries we all like making fun of are going to have access to the internet in a couple years.  Imagine pakistan, the country where blasphemy is a felony that will have you thrown in prison, or countries like ethiopia having access to the internet and complaining saying we don't have the right to disagree with their fucked up moral views.
